game.name: Snow Car Hill Track Racing  Furious Car Racing
game.description:
The best 3D car racing game has hit your screen today! Are you ready to enter this amazing world where you would have the full control on your vehicle? Join Snow Car Hill Track Racing Furious Car Racing and be prepared to play the role of an ultimate drag racer in the city streets! Hey boys! You have a chance to build, race and tune your vehicle to dominate the city. Defeat the grand auto gangsters in the city of San Andreas and prove the world that you are a true racer!

Keep performing until your car performs the best stunts in this brand new racing game! Choose the career mode and do not forget to work your way from rookie to a professional! You would definitely find an extremely dangerous environment to perform death-defying stunts. The fabulous sound effects and HD graphics combined with the real engine sounds will be sufficient enough to keep you entertained for long. Select any out of two modes between practice and career mode and get ready to enter the real fun racing!

There are 8 different levels to play through in the career mode. You have to compete the race against the expert racers at any position to reach to the advanced level. Track your position by looking at the top right corner of the screen! You can also see how many Lap you have completed by keeping your eyes at the top right corner. Put your fingers on the arrow keys or tap the screen to win the race in this 3D car racing game! Play other popular free car games and have fun without download to kill your time!
